This is an example for a valid configuration file.

It is used to process the image below (note that the points marked with an X are the referenced points, the + marked points are calculated by the program and tagged with the names provided in the configuration file).

{{{
# coordinates of reference points from top to bottom
[reference]
61.919367341, 9.70741801
61.878572786, 9.796619732
61.835215548, 9.731496619

# names for waypoints
[waypoints]
RONDSLOTTE
#Lat: 61.914963825 Lng: 9.851069665
VINJERONDE
#Lat: 61.903755963 Lng: 9.848854914
STORRONDEN
#Lat: 61.891556019 Lng: 9.861835046

# runtime parameters
[config]
signal=255, 0, 0
verbosity=100
}}}
